channel.title: Aganoth - The Server You've Been Looking For!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://www.aganoth.com/logo.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://aganoth.com/"]Click here to visit the official website.[/URL]
Aganoth is a server I've been working on since mid July of 2012. My goal for this server is an economy server with a large player base, a great community, and flawless game-play. I am the only server developer, and the server is joint-owned by myself and my partner Drake.
The beta is going to be released as soon as I feel it's ready, which shouldn't be too much longer. Skills will be made after beta is over.
This server was started just basic Runesource by Blakeman, all the content is 100% by me besides what was included in the source (networking, very basic things).
[IMG]http://aganoth.com/media.png[/img]
[URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k0DapakpaUg]A* Path Finding and Dance Following[/URL]
[URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DxTqpnccuhc]NPC Clipping[/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GSFIW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K2oAi.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CSh9b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/43Wgz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AA7Zg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vyiNE.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fN1N5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IzHrA.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://aganoth.com/features.png[/img]
Key: Finished, In progress, Not started
Combat Melee Correct formulas Special Attacks Dragon dagger Whip Armadyl godsword Bandos godsword Zamorak godsword Saradomin godsword Granite maul Dragon longsword Dragon scimitar Barrelchest anchor Dharok Verac Guthan
Ranged Correct formulas Proper projectiles Arrows drop with stacking Ava's accumulator Special Attacks Magic shortbow/longbow Karil's x-bow Bolts Dark bow Rune thrownaxe Seercull
Magic Correct formulas Proper projectiles Correct runes requirements Auto casting and single casting All modern combat spells All ancient combat spells Vengeance Freezing with immunity Poisoning 100% Player and NPC drops
Misc Weapon speed/animation based on attack style Killer determined by most damage dealt Degrading items, like barrows No X-logging Experience in combat
Following System A* Path Finding Dumb (NPC) Path Finding Dancing while following
Skills
Prayer Burying bones Altar support All prayer effects Prayer bonus effects drain rate Runecrafting Construction Agility Herblore Theiving Crafting Fletching Slayer Obtaining tasks Slayer crystal Special npcs Slayer mask implemented into combat formulas Hunter Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Farming
Mini-games Fight Pits Basic like Runescape's Winner's name is displayed Winner stays in arena Viewing orb Zombies (Custom) Barrows Good reward chance All correct combat animations, speeds, etc Digging to crypts and returning up Dueling Pest Control Bounty Hunter Clan Wars
Bosses King Black Dragon God Wars Dagganoth King Kalphite Queen
Miscellaneous Banking Trading Shopping Private messaging Run energy Local and global objects Flax picking Food and Potions Timed punishments Dialogue system Item requirements 100% NPC walking, clipped for objects and other NPCs Pets

item.title: Aganoth - The Server You've Been Looking For!
item.dc:creator: @Mikey_Sasse Mikey Sasse
item.description:
@Mikey_Sasse wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:9, topic:471811”][quote author=Mikey Sasse link=topic=589470.msg4175879#msg4175879 date=1355003182]
all the content is 100% by me besides what was included in the source (networking, very basic things).
[/quote]

The Dumb N.P.C. Pathfinder wasn’t written by you. Was it…?[/quote]

Actually, yes it was. I’m sure many people have written there own because it’s pretty simple.

Read full topic
item.source: Aganoth - The Server You've Been Looking For!

Click here to visit the official website.

Aganoth is a server I’ve been working on since mid July of 2012. My goal for this server is an economy server with a large player base, a great community, and flawless game-play. I am the only server developer, and the server is joint-owned by myself and my partner Drake.

The beta is going to be released as soon as I feel it’s ready, which shouldn’t be too much longer. Skills will be made after beta is over.
